mwr_raw2l1
==========

Welcome to *mwr_raw2l1*'s documentation!

*mwr_raw2l1* is a python library dedicated to reading instrument's native files for the most common types of K- and
V-band microwave radiometers for observations of atmospheric humidity and temperature profiles and writing the level 1
data to a NetCDF format defined by configuration.

It is the code operationally run for the processing of MWR data in `E-PROFILE <https://e-profile.eu>`_

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   installation
   api
